events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund or an exchange for a different size.
The issue has been categorized as Refund based on the customer mentioning 'refund' and 'exchange' in their message.
Assigning this refund request case to the customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'd be happy to help you with your refund or exchange request.
Could you please provide your order number and the condition of the jacket to proceed with the refund or exchange?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it yet or removed any tags.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund immediately or send you a replacement size. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to get a replacement in a larger size. Thank you for helping me with this quickly.
Your exchange request for a larger size jacket has been processed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly with the shipping details.
We just wanted to check in and ensure you have received your replacement jacket and are satisfied with it.
Since your issue appears resolved, we are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
